content_descriptors.notes:
(My Cute Egg Diary) is a simulation game that includes adult-oriented content. Below are the details about the content included:

・All characters in the game are 20 years or older. This ensures compliance with all legal and ethical standards.

・Sexual depictions: The game includes consensual and soft sexual scenes that occur as the player's relationship with the heroine deepens. Partial nudity is present in certain scenarios.

・Comedic and soft erotic content: The game avoids any depiction of violence or forced actions. All adult content is tied to the progression of the relationship with the heroine.

・Sexual expressions in in-game events: Events such as accidental wardrobe malfunctions and light physical interactions naturally occur as part of the heroine's development.

・There are no depictions of sexual violence, drug or alcohol abuse, self-harm, or other potentially offensive content in the game.

name: My Cute Egg Diary Demo

  • Graphics: OpenGL VRAM 1 GB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
